title: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure
description: The schema is not being added properly when using the stored procedure. It seems to be missing from the procedure name.
OB: The schema is not being added when using the stored procedure. It appears that the stored procedure is being called without the schema prefix.
EB: The schema should automatically be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new report.
2. Create a data source.
3. Create a data set using the stored procedure with the schema prefix included in the procedure name.
